channel.title: ---project excel 562----awesome 562 in the making--need a team
channel.description:
alright guys, i made a server awhile back called razenclaw 562, i can honestly say it was a MAJOR leech and a fail, but had about 35-45+ players on. But before that, i was a 508 coder but i just wanted sumtin new. But while running that 562 a learned a lot of 562 coding and stuff.
I took a break from RSPS and went and played CoD and some runescape.
But, after loosing 3 runescape accounts, (all pretty good btw) i am deciding to come back to RSPS, and to make another 562, and i want it to be great. I've noticed that there hasnt been a lot of good 508+ servers around, except like pkmadness or some other servers, so i want to make a DOPE 562
I plan on using Geo's NRscape release. Although he did a great job, he did a lot of really bad stuff that im fixing atm...BUT i still need some help with other things. Now i dont have any money atm, me only being 15. I had about $125 on a paypal but then i got keylogged and lost it, BUT if you decide to help, and it accually gets...GOING...i plan i paying you for your help. I know how to do all the 'little' stuff (ex-Npc spawns, shops, commands, and teles, click object,etc)
BUT i basically just need help with it all and IDEAS and DONATIONS
~~~~~~~~~What I Can Do~~~~~~~~ :Shops(need help) :Npc Spawns :Commands :Object Spawns(need help) :Possibly make a Fourms :Some advertising
~~~~~~~~What I Need People To Help With~~~~~~~~~ :Donations :Ideas(What I mean by this is, like, if you think there should be a lot of skilling, or how you should get money, or some bosses or quests or what ever) :Making item effects work (ex-DH, divine spirit shield, ring of recoil...) :Making or getting me a HD client :A Quest :Minigames :Skills :Bosses :Help with making an economy and making items rare :Donation reward ideas (What Should people Get when they Donate?) :Forums :ADVERTISING (MAJOR ONE HERE, IF YOU HAVE A YOUTUBE CHANNEL WTH 250+ SUBSCRIBERS AND WANT TO POST A VID OF SEREVR, TALK TO ME!) :Basically Over-All-Help(right hand man) :Some Object Spawns
Thanks if you read threw all this, I know it was a Lot, At the moment I only have 2 other people on the team MAYBE
I need All the help! If you want to apply for team, just pick what you can help with, OR tell me an idea.
CONTACT ME AT lukedawesome@hotmail.com

item.title: ---project excel 562----awesome 562 in the making--need a team
item.dc:creator: @12igon8 12igon8
item.description:
@12igon8 wrote:

alright guys, i made a server awhile back called razenclaw 562, i can honestly say it was a MAJOR leech and a fail, but had about 35-45+ players on. But before that, i was a 508 coder but i just wanted sumtin new. But while running that 562 a learned a lot of 562 coding and stuff.

I took a break from RSPS and went and played CoD and some runescape.

But, after loosing 3 runescape accounts, (all pretty good btw) i am deciding to come back to RSPS, and to make another 562, and i want it to be great. I’ve noticed that there hasnt been a lot of good 508+ servers around, except like pkmadness or some other servers, so i want to make a DOPE 562

I plan on using Geo’s NRscape release. Although he did a great job, he did a lot of really bad stuff that im fixing atm…BUT i still need some help with other things. Now i dont have any money atm, me only being 15. I had about $125 on a paypal but then i got keylogged and lost it, BUT if you decide to help, and it accually gets…GOING…i plan i paying you for your help. I know how to do all the ‘little’ stuff (ex-Npc spawns, shops, commands, and teles, click object,etc)

BUT i basically just need help with it all and IDEAS and DONATIONS

~What I Can Do
:Shops(need help)
:Npc Spawns
:Commands
:Object Spawns(need help)
:Possibly make a Fourms
:Some advertising

What I Need People To Help With~
:Donations
:Ideas(What I mean by this is, like, if you think there should be a lot of skilling, or how you should get money, or some bosses or quests or what ever)
:Making item effects work (ex-DH, divine spirit shield, ring of recoil…)
:Making or getting me a HD client
:A Quest
:Minigames
:Skills
:Bosses
:Help with making an economy and making items rare
:Donation reward ideas (What Should people Get when they Donate?)
:Forums
:ADVERTISING (MAJOR ONE HERE, IF YOU HAVE A YOUTUBE CHANNEL WTH 250+ SUBSCRIBERS AND WANT TO POST A VID OF SEREVR, TALK TO ME!)
:Basically Over-All-Help(right hand man)
:Some Object Spawns

Thanks if you read threw all this, I know it was a Lot, At the moment I only have 2 other people on the team MAYBE

I need All the help! If you want to apply for team, just pick what you can help with, OR tell me an idea.

CONTACT ME AT lukedawesome@hotmail.com
